pages.text: 6|9|haey brasenbae yeung ban bangkeut ke( mou ham meat) chea mea la ai kat vinh noh  yeung brakadchea nung brekleay ke tow chea borsa muoy roub  haey yeung pitchea ban bamphean puokke nouv avei del puokke kampoung  te pheanchralam .

6|10|haey chea karpit nasa  banda anakneasar moun anak ka trauv  ban ke chamak der  haey( tondakamm) daoysaarte avei  v del puokke ban  chamak noh ban thleak mk leu puok del ban chamak knongchamnaom puokke .

6|11|chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha  chaur puok anak thveudamnaer now  leu phendei nih  banteabmk chaur puok anak kralek meul choh tha  tae lotthophl  chongokraoy robsa puok del bdeseth noh yeang dauch me  d ch

6|12|chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha  tae avei  del mean now leu  mekh cheachraen chean  ning phendei chea kammosetthi robsa anaknea?  chaur anakachhlaey  tha  chea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh .  trong ban kamnt kdei me tda krounea  leu khluon robsa trong .  trong brakadchea nung bramoulophdom puok anak towkean thngai  barlok vinh daoy kmean kar sangsay champoh vea laey .  puok del khat  bng khluoneng noh  kuchea puok del kmean chomnue .
6|13|avei  del mean now peloyb ning pelothngai  kuchea kamm se ti  th  robsa trong .  haey trong mha lyy  mha doeng .

6|14|chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha  tae aoy khnhom yk anak keapear  krawpi a l laoh del chea anak bangkeut mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei  ning chea anak bratan ahar  haey trong min trauvkar ke bratan ahar  aoy ryy?  chaur anak pol tha  pitabrakd nasa  khnhom trauv ban ke( a l laoh) banhchea  aoy klaytowchea anak kansasanea ai sla m mounke  haey chaur anak kom  klay khluon knongchamnaom puok mou sh ri ki n aoy saoh .
6|15|chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha  pitabrakd nasa  khnhom khlach  tearounakamm nea thngai da thomtheng( thngai barlok)  brasenbae khnhom br pru td lmeusa  nung mcheasa robsakhnhom noh .
6|16|nea thngai noh  bokkol na del trauv ke b nhchie sa pi vea( tearounakamm)  trong pitchea ban anet sraleanh dl ke .  haey noh kuchea  chokchy da chbasaleasa .

6|17|haey brasenbae a l laoh theu  v aoy anak chuobabrateah nouv kroh  thnak aveimuoy  ku kmean anak chuoyosangkroh ke krawpi trong laey . haey  brasenbae trong thveu aoy anak chuobabrateah nouv brakear la namuoy vinh  ku trong  mean anoupheap leu avei  teangoasa .
6|18|haey trong chea anak mean anoupheap leu banda khnhom robsa trong  haey trong mha ktebandet  mha chruotachreab .
